name: xahpayroll
description: XAH Payroll - Decentralized hourly payroll system powered by XAH microtransactions

scripts.dev: npm run validate:env && concurrently -n "BACKEND,FRONTEND" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.build: npm run validate:env && cd frontend && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.deploy: npm run validate:env && cd frontend && npm run deploy

author: Good Money Collective
